animeTitle: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita. Heart
animeDescription: Grab your tickets and get in line for a new series of stop-motion adventures with Rilakkuma and Kaoru! Join Rilakkuma, Korilakkuma, Kiiroitori, and Kaoru as they explore an amusement park in its closing hours when Rilakkuma's Theme Park Adventure arrives next year.(Source: Netflix)
